about.name: Stylianos Mavromatis
bio: Hello! I'm passionate about technology and problem-solving. I love exploring new ideas, building projects, and sharing knowledge with the community.
When I'm not coding, you can find me capturing moments through photography, diving into the latest tech trends, or working on innovative projects that push the boundaries of what's possible.
